ygData.subject: Re:   Feline
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Please stop the violence towards spiders. Why does everyone feel they should kill spiders? I happen to be a spider person, not a cat person, not a dog

From: "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@...>

OOC: Please stop the violence towards spiders. Why does everyone feel they
should kill spiders? I happen to be a spider person, not a cat person, not a
dog person, but a spider person. The senseless killing of spiders is
upsetting me, and I don't want to read any post with violence towards
spiders in it. I'll have to ignore things like that. I don't mean the
violence, the whole mail is what I mean. I'm serious...

----- Original Message -----
From: "Logo morph" <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 10:39 AM
Subject: Feline


> ::Feline::
>
> She went running along through the dence undergrowth.  She felt like
herold
> self again.  She came to a small pod which appeared to have been there for
a
> long time. She looked around, but didn't smell any other bots near by.
She
> tranformed into bot mode and checked out the pod.  She smiled and wondered
> if it was the answer to her situation. "Perhaps I can use this to fix up
my
> little cruiser."  She opened up a panel and stuck her hand inside, trying
to
> find the release mechanism for the propulsion ciruits.  She pulled her
hand
> back as she felt something sharp puncture her skin.  She saw a strange
> spider biting her arm.  "Get off me you little insect."(yes I know a
spider
> is an arachnid and not an insect)
> She threw it to the ground and stepped on it, crushing it under her foot.
> She sneered at the pod. "I'll not touch that thing again if it's going to
> bite me back like that."
> With that, she transformed into leopard mode and continued on her way.
